markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Slumber Wine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=128)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Ingested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
<trait label="Sleep" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=145" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 553 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 325 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Slumber wine sees its greatest use in games of intrigue, where an absence can be more devastating than injury. Characters [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) from slumber wine can't wake up by any means while the poison lasts, don't need to eat or drink while unconscious in this way, and appear to be recently dead unless an examiner succeeds at a DC 40 [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) check.

**Saving Throw** DC 32 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 hour; **Maximum Duration** 7 days; **Stage 1** unconscious (1 day); **Stage 2** unconscious (2 days); **Stage 3** unconscious (3 days).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Slumber Wine
